questions.question_text:
A project manager has been assigned to a new digital product line, which the company hopes will boost their revenue. The product is complex and requires customer feedback to continually refine the product. The project is being handled by a cross-functional agile team.

What should the project manager do to ensure value is delivered quickly?

choices.C: Request a budget increase to pay the subject matter experts (SMEs) more overtime
choices.D: Identify tasks that can run in parallel to deliver the project faster
choices.A: Ask the project sponsor to provide additional resources to fast track the project
choices.B: Plan the project to deliver value incrementally with regular releases

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Plan the project to deliver value incrementally with regular releases
This approach aligns with Agile principles, where the goal is to deliver value to customers in small, frequent increments. By releasing regular updates, the project team can incorporate customer feedback in real-time and adjust the product as needed, ensuring that value is delivered quickly and efficiently.

Selected Answer: B
B. Plan the project to deliver value incrementally with regular releases

Selected Answer: C
C. Share project updates through regular community meetings
Regular community meetings ensure open and accessible communication, fostering engagement and trust with the community members regarding project progress.

Selected Answer: C
C. Share project updates through regular community meetings

choices.A: Share the annual reports virtually and in the local newspapers
choices.D: Share the project reports with the sponsor to inform community members
choices.C: Share project updates through regular community meetings
choices.B: Share project updates when requested by the stakeholders

questions.question_text: A project is designed to provide local community members with health facilities that will support improved sanitation practices. What should the project manager do to ensure the community members are up to date on project progress?

A project manager is assigned to a major system integration project that is currently in the execution phase. The project relies heavily on the presence and availability of certain products and services, which are provided at various periods throughout the project phases by selected third-party vendors.

What should the project manager do to ensure the successful execution of the project?

choices.C: Activate the mitigation plan for the procurement risks.
choices.A: Oversee the selection process for the vendor to procure the needed products and services.
choices.B: Ask the procurement department to select the vendor using established processes.
choices.D: Perform procurement control checks throughout the project.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Perform procurement control checks throughout the project.
Performing procurement control checks ensures continuous oversight of vendor performance and is critical to ensuring that the project remains on track during the execution phase.

Selected Answer: D
D. Perform procurement control checks throughout the project

choices.C: Ask the project sponsor to disseminate project progress across the organization's stakeholders.
choices.D: Send weekly emails to each stakeholder providing them with the project's progress
choices.B: Divide up the organization among the project team to provide direct project updates
choices.A: Set up an intranet site and allow stakeholders to access the relevant project information

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Set up an intranet site and allow stakeholders to access the relevant project information
Setting up an intranet site is the most effective and efficient way for the project manager to ensure that all stakeholders are informed about the project's progress. It promotes transparency and facilitates ongoing communication, which is essential in a matrix organization with many beneficiaries.

Selected Answer: A
A. Set up an intranet site and allow stakeholders to access the relevant project information
